attributes.action: Do not send single male refugees arriving in Britain to Rwanda for processing.
attributes.additional_details: Asylum seekers should be processed in Britain and at temporary processing centres set up in response to wars, dictatorial regimes etc. to avoid refugees making unsafe journeys across the globe in the hands of people smugglers.
attributes.background: All applicants applying for asylum should be processed in Britain or in countries with a good human rights record neighbouring countries where their is mass emigration e. g. Ukrainian refugees could be processed in Poland.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
